name: Hellish Souls
description:
Description

You're a gladiator in hell! Defeat demons by dashing into them, collect their souls, and exchange them with the devil for health or special abilities.

Note: sometimes after a reset the next wave won't spawn. Not sure what causes this, but you can fix this by reloading the page.

Controls

  • Move: WASD
  • Dash/Buy ability: Space
  • Select ability: Arrow keys
  • Use left ability: Q
  • Use right ability: E
  • Teleport: Mouse

Credits

 - Astavie: Programming/SFX
 - The nush: Graphics
 - jtn191: Music
